rules_text:
When Tarase, the Third Charm enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
{4}{B}: Transform Tarase, the Third Charm. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Menace
Tarase, the World String has indestructible as long as another creature died this turn.
Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life and each opponent loses 1 life. If you controlled it, you may move its counters to Tarase.
notes:
Tarase, the World String has indestructible as long as there are six or more creature cards in a graveyard.

Tarase, the World String has indestructible as long as she has three or more counters.
